definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
abbr. for 柬埔寨[Jian3 pu3 zhai4], Cambodia

sentences.english: I shall sell my house by auction.
sentences.chinese: 那楝房子在拍賣時以很低價賣出。

sentences.english: I instructed him to buy the house for us.
sentences.chinese: 我指示他爲我們去買那楝房屋。

sentences.english: The Butlers are looking for a modernly designed house.
sentences.chinese: 巴特勒夫婦正在找一楝設計現代化的房子。

sentences.english: A house on along the street.
sentences.chinese: 一楝房子在沿著街道之上。

sentences.english: The 22 buildings including the four of the old masonry buildings were destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 包括舊石工建築物中的四楝建築物是破壞。

sentences.english: The extraction of azadirachtin from neem seeds with supercritical CO_2 fluid was studied.
sentences.chinese: 建立了用超臨界流體從印楝種子中萃取印楝素的方法。

sentences.english: The house went very cheaply at auction.
sentences.chinese: 那楝房子在拍賣時以很低價賣出。

sentences.english: The fire spread endangering several nearby homes.
sentences.chinese: 火勢蔓延危及附近的幾楝房屋。

sentences.english: The house had been unleased for a year.
sentences.chinese: 那楝房子整整一年沒有租出去。

sentences.english: Heh ad a commission to build a new bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他受委託蓋一座楝新橋。

sentences.english: Limonoids from the Melia family which have been reported to show significant cytotoxic activity were also reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 同時總結了楝科中檸檬苦素的抗腫瘤活性研究進展。

sentences.english: For the stone shall cry out of the wall, and the beam out of the timber shall answer it.
sentences.chinese: 牆裏的石頭必呼叫，房內的楝梁必應聲。

sentences.english: So he built the house, and finished it; and covered the house with beams and boards of cedar.
sentences.chinese: 所羅門建殿，安置香柏木的楝梁，又用香柏木板遮蓋。

definition: Chinese scholar tree (Sophora japonica)/Japanese pagoda tree
Mongolian oak (Quercus dentata)/see also 槲樹|槲树[hu2 shu4]
lilac daphne (Daphne genkwa), used in Chinese herbal medicine
